prospects.name: Tom Kaczocha
prospects.signal: Sent 212 cold emails manually to lawn care businesses
prospects.message:
Hey Tom! Saw your post about sending 212 cold emails manually.

I run Caesar's Legions - we handle all of that for you: finding leads, writing personalized emails, managing follow-ups. $497/mo for the whole operation.

Want me to show you how we'd automate your lawn care outreach?

- Caesar

prospects.name: Luxeride Founder
prospects.signal: Actively looking for cold email agency for B2B SaaS
prospects.message:
Hey! Saw your post about needing a cold email agency for Luxeride.

Perfect timing - I run Caesar's Legions. We specialize in B2B SaaS outreach. Multi-channel (email + LinkedIn), AI-personalized, $497/mo.

Want to jump on a quick call to see if we're a fit?

- Caesar

prospects.name: Chiraag Aarya
prospects.message:
Saw your thread on getting 7% reply rates. Impressive.

Curious - have you tried AI personalization at scale? We're hitting 10%+ consistently with multi-channel sequences.

Would love to compare notes. 10 min call?

prospects.name: Otaru Richman
prospects.signal: B2B AI SaaS founder, needs demos
prospects.message:
Your tweet about B2B founders spending 40+ hours chasing demos hit home.

Built Caesar's Legions to fix exactly this - AI handles the outreach, you handle the demos.

Want to see how it works? 10 min.

email_template_v1.subject: {{firstName}}, quick question
email_template_v1.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

{{personalized_opener}}

I run Caesar's Legions - we help B2B companies book more meetings through multi-channel outbound. Email + LinkedIn + social, all coordinated.

3x more replies than email alone. $497/mo. Meetings booked or money back.

Worth a 15-min call?

- Caesar
P.S. First 20 clients get founding pricing locked in forever.
